about_the_game:
[Feature]

- An adventure game that interlaces map exploration with heart-pounding battles against demons.

- Fervent battles won through well-timed.

- Meet and part with mysterious and comical characters.

- The story of a magical night which will leave you feeling as though you've been dreaming.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear esteemed player,

It is truly a pleasure to meet you. I am Zogzo, Zelle's guide.
What is Zelle, you ask? Hmmm. In a word, it's a game that's rather...peculiar.
At times your hair may stand on end out of sheer terror.
On other occasions you may be overcome by love's warmth.
Zelle is quite the unusual horror adventure game.

But I digress.
Now then, you will experience the world of Zelle through the eyes of our young protagonist, Emerada.
Many of our other residents have...eccentric personalities.
A boy who loves to dance, a moon-faced man who adores children, a kind Reaper who will show you the way...
I imagine you'll meet many unique individuals.

Do be careful, however. A multitude of abominable demons reside in this world as well!
You can drive them off by clicking the Rosary you carry, but they will resort to anything to devour you.
Tread carefully.

Isn't it thrilling? Doesn't it get your blood boiling and your body tingling?
What a wonderful world this is.
Does a glimmer of light await you at the end of the tunnel or only the black depths of despair?

I eagerly await your journey to the world of the gothic horror Zelle.
May we meet again when you turn the final page of this extraordinary story.

Your adoring Reaper,
Zogzo

Warning

Parts of this game contain depictions of blood and gore.

Remarks

・You need a keyboard and mouse to play this game.

・Game saves automatically.

Zelle for smartphone applications.

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra (10.12) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

short_description: Zelle is a occult adventure game. You can explore the inside and outside of the castle using adventure game mechanics and battle demons with strategic mouse clicks. Your goal in this game is to bring the protagonist home.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
